architecture_decisions.title: Bitrix API Adaptor Pattern
architecture_decisions.context: Need a consistent way to fetch data from Bitrix endpoints with proper typing and validation
architecture_decisions.decision: Implement a typed BitrixAdaptor interface and generic fetch function
architecture_decisions.consequences: Standardized approach to API integration, better error handling, and type safety

architecture_decisions.title: React Query for Data Fetching
architecture_decisions.context: Need efficient data fetching with caching and stale-while-revalidate patterns
architecture_decisions.decision: Use React Query for all API data fetching operations
architecture_decisions.consequences: Better UX with optimistic updates, background refetching, and efficient caching

architecture_decisions.title: Mock/Real API Toggle
architecture_decisions.context: Need to support both development without backend and production with real API
architecture_decisions.decision: Implement hooks with mock support and toggle via props and env variables
architecture_decisions.consequences: Improved development experience while maintaining production readiness

architecture_decisions.title: Centralized Constants
architecture_decisions.context: Need to maintain consistent configuration across the application
architecture_decisions.decision: Implement a centralized constants file for global configuration
architecture_decisions.consequences: Easier maintenance and consistency across components

architecture_decisions.title: SSR-Safe Component Design
architecture_decisions.context: Components using browser-specific APIs cause warnings in SSR
architecture_decisions.decision: Use isomorphic hooks and detection of browser environment
architecture_decisions.consequences: Clean server-side rendering without warnings and hydration errors
